repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Two volumes of documentation relating to a jurisdictional dispute over representation between the Upholterers International Union (AFL) and the United Furniture Workers of America (CIO) at the American Seating Company of Grand Rapids, Michigan.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of two volume of documentation relating to a jurisdictional dispute over representation between the Upholterers International Union (AFL) and the United Furniture Workers of America (CIO) at the American Seating Company of Grand Rapids, Michigan. Included are correspondence and notes, contracts, pamphlets and other printed material, and newspaper clippings.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: American Seating Company Jurisdictional Dispute #5658. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5583/1: Archives Organization File (AOF) Part 1 5583/2: Archives Organization File (AOF) Part 2 6178/004: BLS Collection of Collective Bargaining Agreements (Part 4)
